short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the definition of a highlighted word

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When highlighting a word, and right clicking, a new option appears in the context menu, prompting users to define the highlighted word. This can be used on non-google websites to ensure a better reading experience and grasp a deeper vocabulary.
